title: Bug 116786 - Library include should store relative path
EB: When a library is included in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path. For example, if the report design is located at $project/test and we include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary, the designer should store the relative path of the library.
SR:
1. Open the BIRT designer.
2. Create or open a report design located at $project/test.
3. Include a library from $project/otherlib/lib1.rptlibrary.
4. Save the report design.
5. Close the BIRT designer.
